subject: the characters of succession, if they were all dogs
body:
1\. another day of not working (and one more tomorrow, and then starting the week when for everyone else it's on the downslope)

2\. making s'mores on the stove with deborah.

3\. this meme e sent of "_[the characters of succession, if they were all dogs](https://www.reddit.com/r/SuccessionTV/comments/13w2l5a/the_characters_of_succession_if_they_were_all_dogs/)"_
